actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for permanent year-round daylight savings time.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to make daylight saving time effective on a year-round basis. Permits States having parts in more than one time zone to establish a uniform time for the whole State. Requires the Secretary of Transportation to submit to Congress a report on the effects of year-round daylight saving time.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for permanent year-round daylight savings time.
